titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals who are exempt from the self-employment tax by reason of their religious beliefs to establish Keogh plans, etc.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals who are exempt from the self-employment tax by reason of membership in certain religious faiths to establish pension plans.
